name: silenceSecondaryAudioHintNotification
desc: A notification the system posts when the primary audio from other apps starts and stops.

items.name: let AVAudioSessionSilenceSecondaryAudioHintTypeKey: String
items.desc: A user info key that you use to retrieve the silence secondary audio hint type.

items.name: enum AVAudioSession.SilenceSecondaryAudioHintType
items.desc: Constants that indicate whether optional secondary audio muting should begin or end.
